definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: Xiu mei use the language art, to only take a pistol in chongming at present.
sentences.chinese: 秀梅运用语言艺术，令崇明在贺礼中只取去手枪。

sentences.english: Many gifts were showered on the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.chinese: 人们纷纷给新娘和新郎送贺礼。

sentences.english: Bake a treat for someone and send it over to them as a congratulations present.
sentences.chinese: 为他们亲自烤制一份食品作为贺礼送给他们。

sentences.english: Those who received the bridal cakes, were expected to present congratulatory gifts to the girl's parents.
sentences.chinese: 女方父母指望那些收到老婆饼的人会给贺礼。

definition: gift given to sb when meeting them for the first time
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
